resources.string: You are invited to participate in NatureNet, a research project being conducted by the researchers listed at http://research.nature-net.org/people.html. In order for us to collect and study the way people are using technology like NatureNet, we must have your consent.
In order for us to collect and study the way people are using technology like NatureNet, we must have your consent.
I agree that any observations (photos) or comments I contribute to NatureNet may be publicly displayed on the web, mobile phone, or tabletop platforms that comprise NatureNet.

I agree to allow any comments, observations, and profile information that I choose to share with others via the online application to be visible to others who use the application at the same time or after me.
I agree to be videotaped/audiotaped during my participation in this study.
I agree to complete a short questionnaire during or after my participation in this study.
Please provide your information to create an account.
By using NatureNet you agree to the terms of the consent form.
Oops! There seems to be a problem with your Internet connection.
